item.title: Practical Requirement 3
item.description: create a master document structure (including: standard letter) create a source file using appropriate software link a master document to a source file, identifying and using correct field names, using conditional operators specify rules for managing recipients and content of a mail merge set up fields for manual completion create appropriate prompts to the user for manual completion
